pages.text: The modpack has a dynamic difficulty system that will adjust the difficulty of the game based on your performance. If you die a lot, the player difficulty will decrease, making lower level mobs spawn near you. With every major progression milestone, difficulty will majorly increase and mobs will start spawning with special abilities.

pages.title: Mob Traits
pages.text: You can see the different traits that mobs can spawn with when they have high levels. You have a few different ways to deal with the increasing difficulty like using a monster spawner to kill waves of enemies to prevent leveled mobs from spawning in a chunk or using the orb of hostility to reduce player difficulty.$(br)Provided by $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/l2hostility)l2 hostility$()$(br)$(imp)Good luck, you're on a timer!$()
